info.name: MoiPayWay API
info.description:
## Develop awesomely using MoiPayWay API

Our API documentation will guide you on means to integrate MoiPayWay products (such as authenticating users, managing wallets, doing direct verification, and creating tokens).

To get started you will need to create an account [to access API keys.](https://app.moipayway.com/)

##### Environment Details

| Environment {Live & Test} | Production | Development |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Dashboard | [https://app.moipayway.com](https://app.moipayway.com) | [https://app.moipayway.com](https://app.moipayway.com) |
| API | [https://api.moipayway.com](https://api.moipayway.com) | [https://api.moipayway.com](https://api.moipayway.com) |

If you face any challenges don't hesitate to contact us at [hello@moipayway.com](mailto:hello@moipayway.com)

item.name: Misc
item.description: This folder containsÂ miscellaneous endpoints needed to have smooth integration with MoiPayWay infrastructure.

body.raw:
{
    "email": "", //required
    "password": "", //required
    "phone_number": "",
    "send_validation_code": "", //enum Yes or No
    "validation_code": "" //Needed for validation
}

request.description:
**Authentication**

Get in to MoiPayWay infrastructure by creating an account to identify you as a user or sub-user of a merchant account.

**Merchant API key required to authorize**

body.raw:
{
    "email": "",
    "password": "",
    "phone_number": "", //starting with +
    "send_validation_code": "", //enum Yes or No
    "validation_code": "" //Needed for validation
}

request.description:
**Authentication**

Sign in to get token and make calls on the MoiPayWay system.

**Authentication**

Get you back into system using the email address registered with.

**Authentication**

Provide the signed in token to sign out of the system. This provide additional security when using the system.

body.raw:
{
    "action": "view or update",
    "phone_number": "",
    "email": "",
    "password": "",
    "username": "",
    "sms_notification": "",
    "email_notification": ""
}

request.description:
This endpoint allows you to retrieve entire details of an account in the system which correspond with merchant exploring the account.

**Token returned from sign in authentication required**

body.raw:
{
    "name": "",
    "business_email": "",
    "description": "",
    "phone_number": "",
    "invite_code": "",
    "type": "" //Retrieve from type endpoint
}

request.description:
**Authentication**

This endpoint allows you to open a business account or a control account for you to access the MoiPayWay infrastructure.

**Authentication**

Get in control of your merchant account and orders by signing in with the signed in token and the API key associated with your account.

body.raw:
{
    "action": "", //view or update
    "name": "",
    "description": "",
    "success_webhook_url": "",
    "failed_webhook_url": "",
    "short_name": "",
    "bearer": "", //merchant or user
    "merchant_email_notification": "", //Yes or No
    "merchant_sms_notification": "", //Yes or No
    "user_email_notification": "", //Yes or No
    "user_sms_notification": "", //Yes or No
    "logo": "",
    "business_email": "",
    "support_email": "",
    "phone_number": ""
}

request.description: Manage and retrieve your merchant account for updates and settings to meets your usage.

body.raw:
{
    "action": "", //read or create or update or delete
    "email": "", //email of the team to create  [optional]
    "phone_number": "", //phone number of the team to create [optional]
    "management": "", //Yes or No
    "permission": "", //full or partial
    "team_id": "" //email of the team to delete and update or read
}

request.description:
**This endpoint allows you manage your team to have access to the infrastructure.  
  
***To create or add team member*

``` json
{
    "token": "response from merchants signin",
    "action": "create", 
    "email": "email", 
    "permission": "full or partial", 
    "notify" : "Yes or leave blank" 
}

```

*To update or delete*

``` json
{
    "token": "response from merchants signin",
    "action": "update or delete", 
    "team_id": "", 
    "permission": "full or partial if updating", 
}

```
Get list of business types or sectors on MoiPayWay

## Verification with standard secure identification.

Verify IP, phone number, biometric, bank account, facial recognition, company details, government issued IDs and so much more.

body.raw:
{
    "code": "",
    "order_reference_code": "",
    "rangeFrom": "", // dateTimestamp YYYY-MM-DD
    "rangeTo": "", // dateTimestamp YYYY-MM-DD
    "sortBy": "", //enum old or new
    "limit": "", //numbers to display per page
    "page": "", //page number to view
    "type": "", //enum transactions 
    "country": "" //Nigeria
}

request.description:
## Create and manage wallets

To collect, exchange & payout of funds or coins or tokens

body.raw:
{
    "code": "",
    "order_reference_code": "",
    "amount": "", //amount
    "meta": {
        "name": "", //label
        "narration": "", //details of value collection
        "from": "", //customID or address
        "privateKey": "", //sender address Private Key if non-custodial
        "to": "", //customID or address
        "altCurrency": "", //if not sending in base currency. e.g.   CUSD instead of CELO
        "ReceivingCurrency": "", //if not receiving in base currency.
        "bearer": "", //charges bearer
        "gasLimit": "",
        "gasPrice": ""
    }
}

{
    "code": "",
    "order_reference_code": "",
    "type": "", //transactions or list_flows or list_currencies or list_rates or list_wallet or list_account
    "limit": "", //display per page
    "page": "", //page to display
    "filterBy": "", //credit or debit
    "order_status": "", //Successful or Pending or Failed | For list_flows; credit or debit
    "payment_status": "", //Successful or Pending or Failed
    "sortBy": "", //old or new
    "rangeFrom": "", //from timestamp
    "rangeTo": "", //to timestamp
    "currency": "", //filter based on currency display
    "meta": {
        "txID": "", //txID return after each request
        "customID": "", //if passed all the details of addresses the customID has will be returned
        "address": "", // if customID empty, transactions of address will only be display 
        "from": "",
        "to": "",
        "amount": ""
    }
}

request.description:
## Create and manage wallets

To collect, exchange & payout of funds or coins or tokens

body.raw:
{
    "code": "", //get from misc endpoint
    "order_reference_code": "",
    "meta": {
        "for": "", //individual or corportate
        "name": "", //label if for individual pass in this order (lastname_firstname_middlename)
        "dob": "", //mm-dd-yyyy
        "unique_id": "", //bvn
        "bank_name": "",
        "customID": "",
        "utility_bill": "",
        "government_id": "",
        "government_id_type": ""
    }
}

{
    "code": "",
    "type": "", //transactions or list_flows or list_currencies or list_rates or list_wallet or list_account
    "limit": "", //display per page
    "page": "", //page to display
    "filterBy": "", //credit or debit
    "order_status": "", //Successful or Pending or Failed | For list_flows; credit or debit
    "payment_status": "", //Successful or Pending or Failed
    "sortBy": "", //old or new
    "rangeFrom": "", //from timestamp
    "rangeTo": "", //to timestamp
    "meta": {
        "order_reference_code": "", //order_reference_code return after each request
        "customID": "", //if passed all the details of addresses the customID has will be returned
        "account": "", // if customID empty, transactions of address will only be display 
        "from": "",
        "to": "",
        "amount": ""
    }
}

{
    "code": "", //get from misc endpoint
    "order_reference_code": "",
    "blockchain": "",
    "meta": {
        "name": "", //name of the token
        "symbol": "", //symbol of the token
        "customID": "", //optional - email address of account creating for
        "privateKey": "", //Private key of the address paying for gas fee
        "address": "", // address to receive intial token minted
        "dataUrl": "", //URL of token details
        "supply": "", //Total numbers of tokens to be available
        "decimal_digits": "",
        "gasLimit": "",
        "gasPrice": ""
    }
}

request.description:
## Create your own tokens with ease

Token technology made simple.

Build and deploy Web3 services in minutes

body.raw:
{
    "code": "", //get from misc endpoint
    "order_reference_code": "",
    "blockchain": "", //CELO
    "meta": {
        "name": "", //name of the token
        "customID": "", //optional - email address of account creating for
        "privateKey": "", //Private key of the address paying for gas fee
        "address": "", // address to receive token minted
        "token_id": "", //ID of the token
        "amount": "", //Total numbers of tokens to be minted
        "contract_address": "", //Returned when deploying
        "gasLimit": "",
        "gasPrice": "",
        "deductFrom" : ""
    }
}

{
    "code": "", //get from misc endpoint
    "order_reference_code": "",
    "blockchain": "", //CELO
    "kms": "", //ID returned when creating blockchain wallet or xpub_index of generating address
    "manage": "", //Yes or No; required to save mnemonic, xpub and private keys
    "meta": {
        "name": "", //name of the token
        "custom": "", //optional - email address of account creating for
        "privateKey": "", //Private key of the address paying for gas fee
        "address": "", // address to receive token minted
        "token_id": "", //ID of the token
        "amount": "", //Total numbers of tokens to be minted
        "contract_address": "", //Returned when deploying
        "gasLimit": "",
        "gasPrice": "",
        "deductFrom" : "" //e.g. CUSD or CELO or CEUR
    }
}

{
    "code": "", //get from misc endpoint
    "order_reference_code": "",
    "blockchain": "", //CELO
    "kms": "", //ID returned when creating blockchain wallet or xpub_index of generating address
    "manage": "", //Yes or No; required to save mnemonic, xpub and private keys
    "meta": {
        "name": "", //name of the token
        "custom": "", //optional - email address of account creating for
        "privateKey": "", //Private key of the address paying for gas fee
        "address": "", // address to receive token minted
        "token_id": "", //ID of the token
        "amount": "", //Total numbers of tokens to be minted
        "contract_address": "", //Returned when deploying
        "gasLimit": "",
        "gasPrice": "",
        "deductFrom": "" //e.g. CUSD or CELO or CEUR
    }
}

{
    "code": "", //get from misc endpoint
    "order_reference_code": "",
    "blockchain": "", //CELO
    "type": "", //transactions or balance
    "limit": "", //optional
    "page": "", //optional
    "meta": {
        "txID": "", //txID return after each request
        "customID": "", //email address of user
        "address": "", // Wallet address
        "token_id": "", //ID of the token
        "contract_address": "" //Returned when deploying
    }
}
